name: ANS | [TECH] - Nominative accounts must be used when accessing personnal data or system processing personnal data.
description: Access to personal data or to systems used to process personal data must be through nominative accounts.
testingInformation:
1. Authentification mecanisms must be individualized and nominative across all scoped assets
2. When using IAM User: engineers must have and use their dedicated IAM profile.
3. When using IAM Role: Identifying attributes must be passed to sessions in order to identify the engineer that assumed the role.
actionPlanInstructions: Review access control implementations and user authentication processes and shift to the use of nominative accounts and service-accounts.
actionPlanTitle: Nominative credentials and service-accounts not in use.
